question.questionText: Describe what you would see if a mirror were placed along a line of symmetry on a flat object.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The mirror would complete the image of the object and make the object appear whole.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: You see people upside down and kite, cart, cow, buoyant.
A heart.
I see a lot of things that might look like paper it hit the mirror and it soon on the mirror.
